channel.title: Jerome County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Jerome County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at I-84 West
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north at I-84 west to Wendell and Boise. Continue north on Lincoln Ave. to Jerome City Center.

item.title: End ID-25 West at I-84
item.description: End ID-25 West at I-84 in Jerome. Use I-84 west to Wendell and Boise; use I-84 east to Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-25 West at US-93
item.description: ID-25 West at US-93 in Jerome County. Use US-93 South or ID-25 West for I-84.

item.title: ID-25 West at US-93
item.description: ID-25 West at US-93 in Jerome County. Turn right for US-93 north to Shoshone; left for US-93 south to Twin Falls. Continue straight for ID-25 west to Jerome.

item.title: ID-25 West - Hunt Jct.
item.description: ID-25 west at Hunt Jct. Hunt is the site of the Minidoka War Relocation Center, a Japanese Internment Camp during World War 2.

item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25 in Jerome County.

item.title: End ID-50 East at ID-25
item.description: End ID-50 East at ID-25. Turn right for ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton. Continue straight for ID-25 west to Jerome.

item.title: ID-50 East at I-84 (Exit 182)
item.description: ID-50 East at I-84 (Exit 182). Turn right for I-84 East to Burley and Pocatello; continue over freeway for I-84 West to Jerome. Continue on ID-50 east for Eden.

item.title: ID-50 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-50 south. Distance to Kimberly and Twin Falls.

item.title: ID-50 South - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-50 South - Thousand Springs Scenic Byway

item.title: ID-50 South at I-84 East
item.description: ID-50 south at I-84 east to Burley and Pocatello. Continue on ID-50 for Kimberly and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 182 Offramp at ID-50
item.description: I-84 West - Exit 182 offramp at ID-50. Turn left for ID-50 west to Kimberly, Hansen, and Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 182
item.description: I-84 West approaching Exit 182 - ID-50/Kimberly/Twin Falls.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 194 - ID-25/Ridgeway Road/Hazelton. ID-25 west leaves I-84 westbound here. The ID-25 shield is a newer style that has been appearing on guide signs recently.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 194 - ID-25/Ridgeway Road/Hazelton. ID-25 west leaves I-84 westbound here. The ID-25 shield is a newer style that has been appearing on guide signs recently.

item.title: I-84 East at Exit 173 Offramp
item.description: I-84 east - Exit 173 offramp. Use right lane for Twin Falls, College of Southern Idaho, and Shoshone Falls.

item.title: I-84 East at Exit 173 Offramp
item.description: I-84 east - Exit 173 offramp. Use right lane for US-93 south to Twin Falls and Wells, Nev. Use left lane for US-93 north to Sun Valley.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 194 Offramp at ID-25
item.description: I-84 - Exit 194 Offramp at ID-25. Turn right to continue west on ID-25 towards Hazleton. Turn left for Ridgeway Road. ID-25 east joins I-84 eastbound to Kasota Road.

item.title: I-84 East at Exit 173 Offramp
item.description: I-84 east - Exit 173 offramp. Use right lane for US-93 south to Twin Falls and Wells, Nev. Use left lane for US-93 north to Sun Valley.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 173
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 173 - US-93/Twin Falls/Sun Valley. The exit text on this interchange changed in 2013 when the ramp was reconstructed. The former destination was for Twin Falls and Wells, Nev.

item.title: US-93 North at I-84 West
item.description: US-93 north at I-84 west to Jerome and Boise. Continue north on US-93 for Shoshone and Sun Valley.

item.title: US-93 North at I-84 East
item.description: US-93 north at I-84 east to Pocatello. Continue under overpass for I-84 west to Boise. Continue north on US-93 for Sun Valley.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching I-84
item.description: US-93 north approaching I-84. Use right lanes for I-84 west to Boise.

item.title: ID-25 East at I-84/ID-25 East
item.description: ID-25 east at I-84 east (Exit 194) to Burley and Pocatello. ID-25 follows I-84 east 7 miles.

item.title: ID-25 East at I-84 West
item.description: ID-25 east at I-84 west (Exit 194) to Twin Falls. ID-25 continues east on I-84.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east at ID-50 south. Use either ID-25 or ID-50 for I-84 access.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50 to Kimberly
item.description: ID-25 east to Eden and Hazelton, at ID-50 south to Kimberly.

item.title: ID-25 East at ID-50
item.description: ID-25 east approaching ID-50. Use either ID-50 south or ID-25 east for I-84. ID-25 east parallels I-84 from here until the Hazelton area.

item.title: ID-25 East At US-93
item.description: ID-25 east at US-93.

item.title: ID-25 East at US-93
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93 - south to Twin Falls, north to Shoshone.

item.title: ID-25 East Approaching US-93
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93.

item.title: Jct. US-93 on ID-25 East
item.description: ID-25 east approaching US-93. A hawk is sitting on top of the Junction US-93 sign.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at ID-25
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north at ID-25 (Main St.). Use ID-25 west for I-84 access. This is the terminus of former ID-79. The ID-79 shield used to be in between the I-84 and ID-25 shields.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at ID-25
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north (former ID-79) at ID-25 west to Wendell and Boise - east to Shoshone.

item.title: Jct. ID-25 on Lincoln Ave. North
item.description: Lincoln Ave (former ID-79) north approaching ID-25 in downtown Jerome.

item.title: Lincoln Ave. North at I-84 West
item.description: Lincoln Ave. north at I-84 west to Wendell and Boise. This is the southern terminus of former ID-79. ID-79 shield used to be to the right of the I-84 shield.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 168
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 168 - Jerome. This was formerly ID-79, but it was decommissioned in 2007.

item.title: I-84 East - Jerome Next 2 Exits
item.description: Jerome Next 2 Exits on I-84 east

item.title: I-84 East Exit 165
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 165, ID-25/Jerome

item.title: I-84 East Exit 168
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 168, ID-79/Jerome

item.title: I-84 East Exit 173
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 173, US-93 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 182
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 182, ID-50 junction

item.title: I-84 East Exit 182 Offramp
item.description: I-84 at ID-50 interchange to Eden and Hansen

item.title: I-84 East Exit 188
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 188, Valley Road

item.title: I-84 East Exit 194
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 194, Ridgeway Road

item.title: I-84 East Exit 201
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 201, ID-25 to Paul
